search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Teachable (teachable.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Teachable can be found at: [https://teachable.com/pricing](https://teachable.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Teachable Pricing: Explore Free Trial and Paid Plans

extracted_content.content:
Best-in-class features.  
Straightforward pricing.  

-----------------------------------------------------

### Basic

The foundational tools and support you need to build your business.

$59/month

\*Pro, Pro+, and Enterprise plans have 0% transaction fees with any Teachable gateway (i.e. teachable:pay or Monthly Payment Gateway).  
\* Please see our [Fair Use Policy](https://teachable.com/fair-use-policy) for more information on student limits

Pricing FAQs
------------

Can I cancel my account at any time?

We hope you don’t, but of course you can! If you decide Teachable is not right for you, simply cancel your account.

Can I change my plan once I sign up?

Yes. You can change your plan at any time from your school’s admin. You’ll be charged the new plan amount at your next billing date.

Are there any transaction fees?

There are 0% transaction fees on Teachable payment gateways on the Pro, Pro+ and Enterprise plans. The Basic plan has a 5% transaction fee. In addition, there are processing fees charged by payment processors like credit cards.

Who uses Teachable?

Teachable offers creators, influencers, entrepreneurs, and business owners the best, most flexible way to share and tap into the value of their experience and expertise with their audience and customers. Yoga instructors, musicians, financial advisors, watercolor artists, mountain climbers, product marketing coaches... you name it.

Start earning.  
Sign up today.
-------------------------------

Explore Teachable pricing plans including free trial & paid options. Grow your online business and maximize your revenue with best-in-class course creation features.
